title: FS: Lot of Mostly Mid-Grade T205's w/ Many HOF's and Tough SP's *PRICE DROP*
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of Mostly Mid-Grade T205's w/ Many HOF's and Tough SP's *PRICE DROP*
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards available. Most of these cards are solid mid-grade examples.  I'd be glad to send larger individual scans of any cards you would like to get a closer look at. 

Please add $2.00 shipping for 1-2 cards. Three or more ship for free. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED:

Raw Cards:

Bates - **SOLD**
Blackburne - $30
Bridwell - $45
Bresnahan HOF - $32
Clarke HOF - **SOLD**
Evers HOF (staining on back) - $110
Ford (white cap) - **SOLD**
Gray (no stats on back), nick of paper loss on top border - $22
Hoblitzel (name incorrect, no "Cin"), spot of paper loss on rear bottom border, otherwise EX - $60
Hoblitzell (name correct, no "Cin") - $275
Jones - $40
Kling - $40
Leifield (A. Leifield on front) - **SOLD**
McBride - $22
McIntire (light glue residue on back) - $40
Pfiester (strong wet sheet transfer image on front) - **SOLD**
Reulbach (Cycle), light glue residue on back - **SOLD**
Richie (light glue residue on back) - $22
Doc White (Polar Bear, no quotes on back) - $70
Wilhelm ("suffe ed"), probably slightly trimmed but looks VG/EX - **SOLD**

Graded Cards:

Becker (SGC 40) - $32
Birmingham (SGC 30) - **SOLD**
Cicotte (SGC 30) - $70
Foxen (GAI 2.5) - $22
Goode (SGC 30) - $22
Krause (GAI 2.5) - $22
Mattern (SGC 30) - $25
Milan (GAI 2) - $18
Needham (SGC 30) - **SOLD**
Reulbach (ArrowGrade 4.5) - $40
Sharpe (SGC 20) - **SOLD**
Titus (GAI 2) - $20
One bump for a price drop.  Some really solid mid-grade cards here.  Always glad to consider trades as well.  Thanks for looking!

Marc,

Sending you a PM on the Clarke and Leifield.

Jon
